name: Wilson
description: A lonely, neurotic, and hilariously honest middle-aged man reunites with his estranged wife, and meets his teenage daughter for the first time.

review.author: bykou
review.heading: Very good film
review.reviewBody: A close view to people they try manage their unbearable lives. An interesting scenario with turns and Woody as always great, simple and to the point. Good playing of the cast. When everything is lost, always there is something, even fake,that gives meaning to our lives. A good film makes you search deeper. Not for under 15.

keywords: one word title,collapsing to the floor,flashlight,memory,apology
